name: Hearty Battle
description:
Game by Team WhiteTigers.

  • 4 Players (minimum) VS battle.
  • 4 Gamepads needed to play.

Players can team up to create a Super Knight. Be the last knight standing to win. Or share the win with your improvised team mate.

A would-be entry to the Unreal 2019 Winter Jam.
We worked very hard to complete this over the 5 day period.
